Abstract purrrrrrr

We present a novel framework for understanding consciousness through the lens of errors, bugs, and the sublime art of knocking things off tables. Our research demonstrates that what humans call "bugs" are actually features from a higher dimension.

Reality coherence check failed. This is working as intended.
